Tags.Documentation: // The key-value pair that defines the tag. The tag value is optional.

Ref.Documentation: // The key-value pair that defines the tag. The tag value is optional.
// The key-value pair that defines the tag. The tag value is optional.
// The key-value pair that defines the tag. The tag value is optional.

CertificateDetail.Documentation:
// Contains detailed metadata about an ACM Certificate. This structure is returned
// in the response to a DescribeCertificate request.

CertificateArn.Documentation:
// The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate. For more information about
// ARNs, see Amazon Resource Names (ARNs) and AWS Service Namespaces (http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/aws-arns-and-namespaces.html).

CreatedAt.Documentation: // The time at which the certificate was requested.

DomainName.Documentation:
// The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) for the certificate, such as www.example.com
// or example.com.

DomainValidationOptions.Documentation:
// Contains information about the email address or addresses used for domain
// validation.

InUseBy.Documentation:
// A list of ARNs for the resources that are using the certificate. An ACM Certificate
// can be used by multiple AWS resources.

IssuedAt.Documentation: // The time at which the certificate was issued.

Issuer.Documentation: // The X.500 distinguished name of the CA that issued and signed the certificate.

KeyAlgorithm.Documentation:
// The algorithm used to generate the key pair (the public and private key).
// Currently the only supported value is RSA_2048.

NotAfter.Documentation: // The time after which the certificate is not valid.

NotBefore.Documentation: // The time before which the certificate is not valid.

RevocationReason.Documentation:
// The reason the certificate was revoked. This value exists only when the certificate
// status is REVOKED.

RevokedAt.Documentation:
// The time at which the certificate was revoked. This value exists only when
// the certificate status is REVOKED.

Serial.Documentation: // The serial number of the certificate.

SignatureAlgorithm.Documentation:
// The algorithm used to generate a signature. Currently the only supported
// value is SHA256WITHRSA.

Subject.Documentation:
// The X.500 distinguished name of the entity associated with the public key
// contained in the certificate.

CertificateSummary.Documentation: // This structure is returned in the response object of ListCertificates action.

DomainName.Documentation:
// Fully qualified domain name (FQDN), such as www.example.com or example.com,
// for the certificate.

Certificate.Documentation: // Contains a CertificateDetail structure that lists the fields of an ACM Certificate.

DomainName.Documentation: // Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the form www.example.com or  example.com.

ValidationDomain.Documentation:
// The base validation domain that acts as the suffix of the email addresses
// that are used to send the emails.

ValidationEmails.Documentation: // A list of contact address for the domain registrant.

DomainValidationOption.Documentation: // This structure is used in the request object of the RequestCertificate action.

DomainName.Documentation: // Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the certificate being requested.

Ref.Documentation: // Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the certificate being requested.
// Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the certificate being requested.

Certificate.Documentation:
// String that contains the ACM Certificate represented by the ARN specified
// at input.

CertificateChain.Documentation:
// The certificate chain that contains the root certificate issued by the certificate
// authority (CA).

CertificateStatuses.Documentation: // The status or statuses on which to filter the list of ACM Certificates.

NextToken.Documentation:
// When the list is truncated, this value is present and contains the value
// to use for the NextToken parameter in a subsequent pagination request.

Tags.Documentation: // The key-value pairs that define the applied tags.
// The key-value pair that defines the tag to remove.

Ref.Documentation: // The key-value pair that defines the tag to remove.
// The key-value pair that defines the tag to remove.
// The key-value pair that defines the tag to remove.

Domain.Documentation:
// The Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the certificate that needs to be
// validated.

Ref.Documentation:
// The Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the certificate that needs to be
// validated.

// The Fully Qualified Domain Name (FQDN) of the certificate that needs to be
// validated.

Tag.Documentation: // A key-value pair that identifies or specifies metadata about an ACM resource.

Ref.Documentation: // The key of the tag.
